summary: A voting website called www.getmsgorkfired.com with a black screen, two buttons (yes/no), a question about supporting the CR and getting Ms.Gork fired, and real-time vote count display

existing_features.title: Display the question 'do you support the CR and getting Ms.Gork fired?' prominently on a black background screen
Render two voting buttons labeled 'yes' and 'no' below the question
Display the current vote counts for both 'yes' and 'no' responses after the user votes
Apply a bold, striking visual design with high contrast against the black background that creates an impactful, dramatic aesthetic suitable for a voting question interface

new_feature_requests.summary: Black screen layout with centered question and yes/no buttons
Display vote counts after user votes
Track and persist vote data for yes/no responses
Record and persist user votes when either the 'yes' or 'no' button is clicked
